page.title: 13Broughton Village (1)
page.content: Broughton is a {quiet village} one and a half miles from North Newington and {two miles from Banbury}. Broughton is much more modernised than North Newington or Lower Tadmarton. The most important thing about Broughton is the {castle}. Broughton is a village of peace. It is built on the side of a hill sloping down to the brook. It is only a small village with a {population of 400}. There is hardly any {Hornton Stone} left in Broughton. Most of the houses are now built of {beige brick}. There is a lot of grass area and on the hill behind the village is a {cemetry}. There is one {Post Office} nd one {Public House} called{The {Saye and Sele Arms'. }I have now found out that the village itself has very little ancient history
